about_the_game:
The DreamWorks Trolls Remix Rescue Deluxe Character Pack is loaded with exclusive characters and content for the most rockin’ DreamWorks Trolls Remix Rescue experience!

The DreamWorks Trolls Remix Rescue Deluxe Character Pack includes:

• 2 exclusive playable characters:
- John Dory from the all-new DreamWorks Animation film Trolls: Band Together
- Floyd from the all-new DreamWorks Animation film- Trolls: Band Together

• 3 brand-new costumes*:
- Branch as depicted in the DreamWorks Animation film- Trolls World Tour featuring a rockin’ outfit with coordinated sunglasses
- Poppy as depicted in the DreamWorks Animation film- Trolls World Tour featuring a groovy outfit with heart-shaped sunglasses
- Branch as seen in the DreamWorks Animation film- Trolls

* costumes will become available once Poppy and Branch are unlocked in the game
detailed_description:
The DreamWorks Trolls Remix Rescue Deluxe Character Pack is loaded with exclusive characters and content for the most rockin’ DreamWorks Trolls Remix Rescue experience!

The DreamWorks Trolls Remix Rescue Deluxe Character Pack includes:

• 2 exclusive playable characters:
- John Dory from the all-new DreamWorks Animation film Trolls: Band Together
- Floyd from the all-new DreamWorks Animation film- Trolls: Band Together

• 3 brand-new costumes*:
- Branch as depicted in the DreamWorks Animation film- Trolls World Tour featuring a rockin’ outfit with coordinated sunglasses
- Poppy as depicted in the DreamWorks Animation film- Trolls World Tour featuring a groovy outfit with heart-shaped sunglasses
- Branch as seen in the DreamWorks Animation film- Trolls

* costumes will become available once Poppy and Branch are unlocked in the game

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: Quad-core Intel or faster / AMD, 2.5 GHz or faster
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX11 or DirectX12 compatible graphics card
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Quad-core Intel or faster / AMD, 2.5 GHz or faster
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 970
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
